#1 in Potato Mashers
Date First Available May 10, 2018

Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:03:21 UTC – Details)


This multi-functional tool from Farberware can serve as a meat chopper or potato masher, easily chopping and stirring ground meat, mashing soft cooked foods, and chopping and stirring fruit juice concentrates, frozen fruit, or homemade sauces and spreads. Made of BPA-free nylon, this chopped meat masher is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it safe for all of your hot foods.
Easily cook ground beef and ground turkey with this multi-functional meat chopper utensil
The 5-blade design lets this hamburger meat chopper double as a masher; Quickly mix and mash softer cooked foods, like potatoes, yams, pumpkin, squash, rutabagas, turnips, parsnips, carrots, apples, bananas, and more
Heat resistant: the oversized, BPA-free nylon head is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it a safe tool for cooking ground meat, potatoes, and other hot foods; Safe to use on all types of cookware including nonstick and coated
Easy to use: mash by pressing blades into cooked food until desired consistency is achieved; angled blades scrape the sides of bowls and pots while mixing and mashing
Easy to clean: dishwasher safe, making clean up quick and easy

BPA-free nylon head is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it safe for hot foods and for coated cookware.

Five blades let you quickly mash, mix, and chop and the angled blades easily scrape the sides of bowls and pots.

Specially designed handle offers comfort and control.

Read more

5
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:03:21 UTC – Details)

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more





Dark Grey with White Lattice Print
Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede
Paws-Black Fleece

#2 in Office Furniture Casters
Date First Available March 11, 2016

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $36.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Original Rollerblade Style Office Chair Wheels, Safe for All Floors.

1 Safe for All Floors 2 Hardwood 3 Carpet 4 Laminate / Vinyl / Tile

Universal Size – Fits 98% of All Office Chairs

These chair casters are the universal size and fit 98% of all office chairs on the market. If they don’t fit your specific chair, no problem, we’ll take care of you.

Quick & Easy Installation

No tools required at all! Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop in the new ones. Replacing your chair wheels is easy and takes less than 30 seconds.

Our Lifetime Promise to You

Our lifetime promise has no expiration. So if you EVER have any issues with your new chair casters, we’ll send you a brand new set.

The ORIGINAL Rollerblade Style Chair Wheels!

We were the first to introduce rollerblade style wheels for office chair, way back in 2016. Designed in the USA, we continue to evolve and improve these office chair wheels.

The Office Oasis Featured on PBS Show ‘StartUP’

The co-founders of The Office Oasis, Meredith and Kevin, were featured on the PBS show StartUp. They shared their story on how they started a growing e-commerce business with just one simple idea.

★ LIFETIME WARRANTY – Our warranty never expires, so if you EVER have any issues, we’ll send you a brand new set of wheels. There are many cheaper knock offs available, but we’re the only brand that offers and stands behind a full lifetime warranty.
★ SAFE FOR ALL FLOORS – Many chair wheels use cheap, low quality materials that destroy your flooring. We don’t. Encased with soft, polyurethane material our rollerblade style wheels are guaranteed not to scratch or leave marks on any surface (including hardwood, carpet, tile, laminate and more).
★ QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION – No tools required! Easily remove and replace the wheels in your desk chair in less than 30 seconds. Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop these in. Check out our quick replacement video for more details.
★ UNIVERSAL SIZE – Upgrade any rolling office chair with these smooth caster wheels. The universal size stem will fit almost every office chair on the market. If for some reason they don’t fit your specific chair, we’ll give you a full refund and even pay the return shipping.
★ SUPPORTS UP TO 650 LBS – Manufactured with the best available materials these casters are built to last a lifetime. Heat treated high-grade steel, precision ball bearings, and durable polyurethane provide years of effortless rolling. The heavy duty chair wheels easily support 650 lbs.

The Office Oasis

Functional, Modern Office Essentials That Look & Feel Good

Previous page

  2. Message from the Brand Owners

    “We want you to be absolutely thrilled with your purchase. So if you ever need anything, just let us know!”

    -Meredith & Kevin

  3. Explore More

    Visit the Store

  4. As Seen on PBS

    Co-Founders Meredith and Kevin share their story on the PBS show Start Up.

  5. Our Story – We’re a small family owned business that started with one simple idea. Rollerblade wheels on office chairs so people everywhere could protect their hardwood floors.

    Our Mission – To create functional office essentials that look & feel good. Because you deserve to work in a space that you love.

    Our Promise – We’ll do everything possible to make sure you are absolutely thrilled with your purchase. No matter what, we are here for you.

Next page

item.content:encoded:
Price: $25.29 - $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

18 UNITS DOG TOYS FOR PUPPIES AND SMALL DOGS.

Bestdoggo Super Value Toys Pack for Dogs, Help Your Dog Get More Fun, and Protect Your Home.

Dog loves to chew thing, especially puppy, they love to chew around when they feel lonely or teeth growing, give your dog our dog toy, let them play with the toy, not your shoes, clothes, underwear, or furniture.

Dogs love our toy, it’s a great gift for your beloved dogs.

Why do you need our toys?

Building relationship

You can play fetch or hiding game with your dog, it’s a great way to build relationship with your dog, makes your dog loves you more!

Teeth cleaning

No-toxic material rubber toy is a good toy for puppies and small dogs to chew.

Durable and fun to play with

18 pcs durable dog toys, it’s multifarious and colorful, your dog will love our toys.

Easy to wash

Our toys are washable.

18 pcs in one bag, one time purchase with long last.

Quantity
18 Units 7 Units 6 Units 1 Units

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.79 x 9.53 x 3.94 inches; 1.43 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 3, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bestdoggo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09V26ML4B

【Safe and High Quality】Great interactive and training toy, you can play fetch and hiding game with your dog, enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.Build energy and health, helps dog solve boredom and anxiety separation, protect furniture from dog chewing.
【Great for Dental Health】Clean teeth, clean your dog’s teeth, make your dog healthier, by chewing the rubber toys and rope toys, dog could get gum massage and stress relief.
【Design for Small Dogs and Puppies】Premium material with built-in squeaker, no glue and non-toxic material, safe and fun, great for puppies.【NOTE!】NOT for aggressive chew dogs, our toys designed for puppies small and medium-sized dog.
【Service from Us】We are so certain that your dog will love these small dog toys. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.
【NOTE!】Please note! These toys set is not suitable for large dogs, aggressive dogs. The toys cannot be eaten. No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged. At the same time, we suggest that the owner pay attention to the damage of the puppy toy in time.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

item.title: PETLIBRO Cat Water Fountain Stainless Steel, 2L & 3L Hygienic Pet Water Fountain, Food-Grade Dog Water Dispenser, Super Quiet, Dishwasher Safe with Adjustable Water Flow for Cats & Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand PETLIBRO was founded in 2019 in C.A., USA, in the belief that pet owners should be able to easily connect with their pets via trustable products. Since established, with our affection for pets and obsession with detail, we have designed products that pet owners would desire and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:23:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

PETLIBRO was founded in 2019 in C.A., USA, in the belief that pet owners should be able to easily connect with their pets via trustable products.

Since established, with our affection for pets and obsession with detail, we have designed products that pet owners would desire and shipped to homes in the US, UK, Germany, French, CA and Japan.

Top Saving Fountain

Top Saving Feeder

Top Saving Feeder

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.27 x 3.54 x 11.02 inches; 1.6 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PLWF003
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 18, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETLIBRO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZCY1FJT
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Food-grade & Dishwasher Safe: PETLIBRO pet water fountain is made entirely of 304 stainless steel. It’s BPA-free, rust- and corrosion-resistant, and can be washed in the dishwasher.
Adjustable Water Flow: The water flow of the PETLIBRO water dispenser can be adjusted to suit your pet’s preference, attracting it to drink more water, which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Super Quiet & Easy to Use: A silent pump means this dog water dispenser operates below 30dB, which is almost inaudible. The ergonomic handle makes it easy to pull the lid off to clean inside and add water.
24/7 Filtered Fresh Water: PETLIBRO automatic pet fountain is equipped with a filter and pre-filter sponge. The double filtration system filters hair and other debris to remove odors and impurities, providing purified running water for your pet. (Replace filter every 2-4 weeks) Search “B08ZCTGNGD” for filter.
Leak- & Splash-proof Design: Overflow is prevented by a raised pump holder, and the trumpet-shaped water outlet pipe can prevent splashing of water even when the water outlet is blocked by a pet’s naughty paw. We offer 30 days free return and 1 year warranty, please feel free to contact us to get a satisfied solution.

We focus on the unique needs of pets. Our affection for pets and obsession with detail, is what leads us to make premium products constantly, deliver a convenient lifestyle to you, and help your pets have a better life.

Keep Your Pet Hydrated and Healthy

PETLIBRO Stainless Steel Pet Water Fountain is designed for cats, dogs and other medium-sized pets. Enough intake of water plays an important role in the health of your pets. As pet lovers, we designed the stainless steel water fountain to take care of your adorable pets by attracting them to love drinking water.

  • SUS 304 Stainless Steel Body
  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Adjustable Water Flow
  • Double Filtration System(Please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to buy the true filters)
  • Runs Quietly( ≤30dB )
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Leakage-proof & Splashing-proof
  • 5.9ft cable

Read more

Read more

Important Note:

  1. Only for indoor use.
  2. For your pet’s health and a longer pump service life, it is recommended to change the water thoroughly and clean the Water Tank, Tray, Foam Filter and Pump at least once a week.
  3. If you have multiple pets, it is recommended to clean the water fountain and change the filter more often.
  4. For your pet’s health, please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to purchase the real PETLIBRO Filters, DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.
  5. If your pet refuses to use the water fountain, it’s recommended to leave its previous water source next to the water fountain for a while. Your pet may need some time to get familiar with it. If your pet gets used to drinking from this Water Fountain, you can remove the previous water source.
  6. If the water fountain makes more noise, please check if the water level reaches the minimum level and if the impeller is covered by the scale. It is recommended to clean the impeller once a week.
  7. How to remove the scale: Remove the pump cover, soak for 30 minutes with a 1:1 ratio of white vinegar and aqueous solution or food-grade citric acid.
  8. Not recommended for large-sized dogs.
  9. If the Water Fountain is dispensing a low amount of water or dispensing no water, you can reset it by following the steps below:

  • Check if you have properly installed the Top Tray, make sure to refill water to the maximum level.
  • Wash and clean the Water Pump. (Recommended reference cleaning video)
  • If washing doesn’t work, please clean the tough scaling on the water pump and the impeller.
